text:
Currently I am in a course to be an IoT (Internet of Things) engineer at ESIR school in Paris.
 	When I was younger, I played a lot on video games and I was passionate about computer sciences. I have also my brother who is a doctorant in bio-informatics so I knew well how it works in this domain. He showed me these lessons he had in university so I could really know what I will do in the university and choose well.
 	In college, I was good at maths and physics and not really in literary subjects so my professors said to me to go in preparation classes. However I wasn’t ready to work everyday and everynight for my study at this time. Therefore I decided to search for preparation classes integrate in a school which are more easy compared to classic preparation classes.
 	So I started to look for study in this field. I found ESIR school and this preparation classes in informatics and electronics. Before the university I knew nothing on electronics but I discovered it in the first year and the subject was very interesting. In ESIR2 we had to choose between three options in informatics. The first one is only informatics science like development of software, the second one is about digital imagery and the third is about electronics and informatics development.
 	So I decided to go to a course where computer science and electronics are together. I choosed the IoT course. It’s a good deal between electronics and informatics and it was the option which correspond to my profil.
